question.text: A driver does something that upsets you. You should

explanation.text: There are times when other road users make a misjudgement or mistake. When this happens try not to get annoyed and don’t react by showing anger. Sounding your horn, flashing your headlights or shouting won’t help the situation. Good anticipation will help to prevent these incidents becoming collisions.

answer.text: let them know how you feel
